data.eml:eml: A new Hemigrammus Gill from upper rio Paraná system, Southeastern Brazil (Characiformes: Characidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marinho, Manoela M. F., Carvalho, Fernando R., Langeani, Francisco, Tatsumi, Vio L. (2008): A new Hemigrammus Gill from upper rio Paraná system, Southeastern Brazil (Characiformes: Characidae). Zootaxa 1724: 52-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181167
